category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: Can move their entries to trash
Can disable comments on their entries
Can edit entries of other users

category.name: wcf.acp.modificationLog
category.item: Entry moved to the trash bin

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Allow to assign entries to additional categories and display them within these categories.
Show category of entry in overview
Shows the main category of each entry in the tile and list view.
Show category of entry in BBCode
Enter the complete Font Awesome name of the icon which is display, if the user did not upload an own icon. Default is “fa-tv”.

Users can upload an icon that will be used to present the entry.
If icons are not allowed, user avatars will be displayed.
Use last change to identify new entries.
Use last change as time of entry.
Entries are removed from the trash by the following days. Use 0 to disable.

Choose the tab in which attachments (images) are to be displayed.
Attachment settings like number, type or size are defined by user group permissions for Images.

category.name: wcf.acp.rebuildData
category.item: Rebuilds the search index and recalculates the activity points.

category.name: wcf.clipboard
category.item: Do you really want to delete the marked entry{if $count != 1}s{/if}?
Do you really want to move the marked entry{if $count != 1}s{/if} to the trash?

category.item: Reacted with {@$like->render()} to the comment by {if $commentAuthor}{$commentAuthor->username}{else}a guest{/if} on the entry {if $entry->hasLabels()}{foreach from=$entry->getLabels() item=label}{lang}{$label->label}{/lang} {/foreach}{/if}{$entry->getTitle()}.

category.name: wcf.page
category.item: Display Window entry {$entry->getSubject()}
Display Window entries by {$user->username}

category.name: wcf.user.notification
category.item: Notify me of new entries in watched categories
Notify me of editions of watched entries
Notify me of new comments on my entries
Notify me of new replies to my comments
Notify me of new replies to comments on my entries
Notify me when someone reacted to my entries
Notify me when someone reacted to my comments
Notify me when someone reacted to my replies to comments

category.name: show.acp.entry
category.item: Default option value suggested on first edit.
Do you really want to delete the option field {$option->optionTitle|language}?

You can use select options in combination with selection types, but please be aware that using the colon will cause the system to use everything to the left as an internal identifier and only the part after the colon will be displayed to the user. This allows you to change the value displayed to the user without harming existing selections unless the identifier itself is being changed. Enter one select option per line.
You can provide a regular expression to validate the user input.

category.name: show.category
category.item: Do you really want to delete this category? All child categories of this category will be moved to this category’s parent category. Entries which are only in this category will be deleted.

category.name: show.contact
category.item: The address contains censored words: {implode from=$censoredWords key=censoredWord item=number}{$censoredWord}{if $number > 1} ({#$number}×){/if}{/implode}
The address may be 65.000 characters long.
{$userProfile->username} has provided contact data.
The email address may be 255 characters long.
The name contains censored words: {implode from=$censoredWords key=censoredWord item=number}{$censoredWord}{if $number > 1} ({#$number}×){/if}{/implode}
The name may be 255 characters long.
Others contains censored words: {implode from=$censoredWords key=censoredWord item=number}{$censoredWord}{if $number > 1} ({#$number}×){/if}{/implode}
The URL may be 255 characters long.

category.name: show.entry
category.item: Only {#$__wcf->session->getPermission('user.show.maxCategories')} categories may be selected in total.
Do you really want to delete this entry?
Do you really want to move this entry to the trash?
You are editing the entry of another user.
Allows users to comment on this entry.
Type in the location and select a result from the suggestions. Alternatively, you may drag the marker in the map to the desired location.
The icon will be displayed next to the entry. The icon’s dimensions must be at least 144×144 pixels. Allowed file extensions are jpg, jpeg, png
Do you really want delete this icon?
The uploaded file is not an image.
An unknown error occurred during the upload.
You must upload at least one image.

You can change the display order of the uploaded images by dragging them with the mouse.
The image in the first position is used as a preview image elsewhere. It should have a size of 400px x 300px or a multiple of it for optimal viewing.
This entry will remain inaccessible for others until approved by a moderator.
Newly uploaded entries will remain inaccessible for others until approved by a moderator.
You have entered an invalid value.
Added the {if $entry->hasLabels()}{foreach from=$entry->getLabels() item=label}{lang}{$label->label}{/lang} {/foreach}{/if}entry {$entry->getSubject()}.
Reacted with {@$reactionType->renderIcon()} to the entry {if $entry->hasLabels()}{foreach from=$entry->getLabels() item=label}{lang}{$label->label}{/lang} {/foreach}{/if}{$entry->getSubject()}.
Commented on the entry {if $entry->hasLabels()}{foreach from=$entry->getLabels() item=label}{lang}{$label->label}{/lang} {/foreach}{/if}{$entry->getSubject()}.

Replied to a comment by {$commentAuthor->username} on the entry {if $entry->hasLabels()}{foreach from=$entry->getLabels() item=label}{lang}{$label->label}{/lang} {/foreach}{/if}{$entry->getSubject()}.
Enter a short description of your entry, it must not exceed {#SHOW_MAX_TEASER_LENGTH} characters.
Do you really want to stop watching all entries?
Do you really want to stop watching all the marked entries?

category.name: show.index
category.item: The application "Display Window" is a test version. The running time is limited until {@SHOW_EVALUATION_END|plainTime}{if SHOW_EVALUATION_END > TIME_NOW} ({@SHOW_EVALUATION_END|dateDiff:TIME_NOW:true}){/if}. For a further use of this software beyond that time limit you need to purchase a license or delete the software and its contents completely.
Display Window: Display Window{if SHOW_VERSION_NUMBER} {@PACKAGE_VERSION}{/if}, developed by zaydowicz.de

• {#$stats[authors]} Author{if $stats[authors] != 1}s{/if}
  • {#$stats[entrys]} {if $stats[entrys] != 1}Entries{else}Entry{/if}
  • {#$stats[views]} Download{if $stats[views] != 1}s{/if} ({#$stats[viewsPerDay]} View{if $stats[viewsPerDay] != 1}s{/if} per Day)
  • {#$stats[comments]} Comment{if $stats[comments] != 1}s{/if}

category.name: show.entry.log
category.item: Set the label to {$additionalData[label]->label|language}.
Moved the entry to the trash{if $additionalData[reason]}: {$additionalData[reason]} {/if}.
There are no log entries for this entry.
Entry was deleted by {$username}{if $additionalData[reason]} for the following reason: {$additionalData[reason]}{/if}. ({@$time|time}).
